clientId.title: Client ID
clientId.description: The client ID of your app you created in the Daikin Developer Portal

clientSecret.title: Client Secret
clientSecret.description: The client Secret of your app you created in the Daikin Developer Portal

callbackServerExternalAddress.title: Redirect URI address
callbackServerExternalAddress.description: The address where the callback server is reachable. This address should be reachable from the browser you're going to do the authorisation flow. This is most likely your Homebridge instance IP address. Mind that it can't be localhost because Daikin blocks this.

callbackServerPort.title: Redirect URI port
callbackServerPort.description: The port where the callback server is reachable. This port should be reachable from the browser you're going to do the authorisation flow.

oidcCallbackServerBindAddr.title: Callback Server address listener
oidcCallbackServerBindAddr.description: Network interface that the HTTP server should bind to. Bind to all interfaces for convenience, please limit as needed to single interfaces. This often is 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0 or localhost

showExtraFeatures.title: Show advanced features
showExtraFeatures.description: Expose extra advanced features as streamer mode, econo mode and powerful mode. They will only appear when they are also supported by your device.

excludedDevicesByDeviceId.title: Exclude specific devices
excludedDevicesByDeviceId.description: Exclude specific devices by their device id. You can find the device id in the Homebridge logs (debug mode does not have to be on)

updateIntervalInMinutes.title: Update interval in minutes
updateIntervalInMinutes.description: Interval in minutes when we poll the Daikin API. Because of rate limitations we recommend to leave this at 15 minutes. This will result in 96 calls to the API per day ((24 * 60) / 15). The rate limit per day is 200.
